creator: katkere@praja.com
text:
Methods in SQLExec are protected but all fields are private. Make these fields 
accessible to sub classes (via protected get methods, perhaps).

What I really need is customizable print results functionality, with a layout 
class, perhaps. That's a different RFE, though.
Could you provide a patch that adds the getter methods you need?
creator: bodewig@apache.org
nick@chalko.com
text:
The patch in bug 8429
adds some of the getters desired

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 8429 ***
